com.atherys.quests.quest.task

Class Tasks

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atherys.quests.quest.task.Tasks

  • public final class Tasks
extends java.lang.Object
    A "task" in the context of the Quests plugin is defined as any generic executive action the completedQuest maker would like the completedQuest to do. Examples include: spawning mobs, spawning particles, adding/removing blocks from the world, etc. etc. This factory class is designed to ease the creation of such tasks
